settings.title: Settings
settings.principal_description: Your ID for the {OISY_NAME}. Created by your Internet Identity.
settings.session_description: All sessions last 1 hour. After 1 hour, you will need to authenticate again with Internet Identity.
settings.testnets_description: Display the test networks (Sepolia) and twin tokens on testnets (ckTESTBTC and ckSepolia).
settings.testnets_toggle: Toggle to show or hide testnets
settings.tokens_description: The list of tokens currently supported by your {OISY_NAME}.
